# Proposal to upgrade the ledger suite orchestrator canister to add ckXAUT

Git hash: `3d0b3f10417fc6708e8b5d844a0bac5e86f3e17d`

New compressed Wasm hash: `ccda8966249bc7d89f14968a242d6fb2c33d2363336303ec4f12977cab74c6f7`

Target canister: `vxkom-oyaaa-aaaar-qafda-cai`

Previous ledger suite orchestrator proposal: https://dashboard.internetcomputer.org/proposal/131755

---

## Motivation
This proposal upgrades the ckERC20 ledger suite orchestrator to add support for [XAUt](https://etherscan.io/token/0x68749665FF8D2d112Fa859AA293F07A622782F38#tokenInfo). Once executed, the twin token ckXAUT will be available on ICP, refer to the [documentation](https://github.com/dfinity/ic/blob/master/rs/ethereum/cketh/docs/ckerc20.adoc) on how to proceed with deposits and withdrawals.

## Upgrade args

```
git fetch
git checkout 3d0b3f10417fc6708e8b5d844a0bac5e86f3e17d
cd rs/ethereum/ledger-suite-orchestrator
didc encode -d ledger_suite_orchestrator.did -t '(OrchestratorArg)' '(variant { AddErc20Arg = record { contract = record { chain_id = 1; address = "0x68749665FF8D2d112Fa859AA293F07A622782F38" }; ledger_init_arg = record { decimals = 6; transfer_fee = 1; token_symbol = "ckXAUT"; token_name = "ckXAUT"; token_logo = "data:image/svg+xml;base64,"; }}})'
```

* [`0x68749665FF8D2d112Fa859AA293F07A622782F38`](https://etherscan.io/token/0x68749665FF8D2d112Fa859AA293F07A622782F38) is the address of the XAUt smart contract on Ethereum Mainnet which can be verified on [Tether's website](https://tether.to/en/supported-protocols/).
* The transfer fee is `1`, corresponding approximately to 0.003 USD. This value was selected to be easy to reason about, while remaining within the acceptable range of 0.1 to 1 cent.

## Release Notes

No changes to the ckERC20 ledger suite orchestrator canister codebase, since this proposal uses the same version `3d0b3f10417fc6708e8b5d844a0bac5e86f3e17d` as the previous proposal ([131755](https://dashboard.internetcomputer.org/proposal/131755)).

## Wasm Verification

Verify that the hash of the gzipped WASM matches the proposed hash.

```
git fetch
git checkout 3d0b3f10417fc6708e8b5d844a0bac5e86f3e17d
./ci/container/build-ic.sh -c
sha256sum ./artifacts/canisters/ic-ledger-suite-orchestrator-canister.wasm.gz
```
